thing-type.label: Pioneer Classic AVR over IP
thing-type.description: Control a classic Pioneer AVR (SC-57, SC-LX85, SC-55, SC-1526, SC-LX75, VSX-53, VSX-1326, VSX-LX55, VSX-2021, VSA-LX55, VSX-52, VSX-1126, VSX-1121, VSX-51, VSX-1021, VSX-1026, VSA-1021, VSX-50, VSX-926, VSX-921, VSA-921, VSX-922) over IP

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The address of the Pioneer AVR to control.

parameter.name: tcpPort
parameter.label: TCP Port
parameter.description: The TCP port number used to connect to the AVR.
